column2: "Na EWURADZE see Noa dɛ
column3: ɔwo nye wo fie nyinara nkɔ hɛn no mu; osiandɛ ɔwo na mehu wo dɛ etsen wɔ m'enyim wɔ ber yi mu."

column2: "Mbowa a hɔn ho tsew nyinara fa hɔn mu esuon esuon
column3: onyin nye ne ber; na mbowa a hɔn ho nntsew no mu ebien ebien

column2: "wimu ntumbowa mu so
column4: enyin nye aber; ama hɔn ase eenya nkwa wɔ asaase nyinara enyi."

column2: "Na aka nda esuon ma maama nsu atɔ egu asaase do adaduanan adzekyee nye adzesaa; na mebɛsɛɛ adze a nkwa wɔ mu a mayɛ nyinara no efi asaase enyi."
"Na Noa yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ no no nyinara."
"Aber a nsuyirii baa asaase do no nna Noa edzi mfe ahaesia."
"Na Noa
column4: nye ne yer nye ne mba hɔn yernom

column2: "Mbowa a hɔn ho tsew
column3: nye mbowa a hɔn ho nntsew
column5: nye mbowa a wɔwea wɔ daadze nyinara mu
column7: "ebien ebien kɔr Noa nkyɛn wɔ hɛn no mu
column9: dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ Noa no."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ nda esuon ekyir no
"Noa no nkwa mu afe a otsia ahaesia no mu
column3: bosoom a otsia ebien no ne da a otsia duesuon no ara na bun kɛse no no nsunyiwa nyinara paapaae; na ɔsor ntokura buebuei."

column2: "Na nsu tɔree guu asaase do adaduanan adzekyee nye adzesaa."
"Da no ara na Noa nye ne yer na ne mba Sem
column5: hɔn yernom baasa no ka hɔn ho

column2: "Hɔn
column5: nye ntumbowa ahorow nyinara kɔr hɛn no mu."

column2: "Na wɔkɔr Noa nkyɛn wɔ hɛn no mu
column3: honam a nkwahom wɔ mu nyinara mu ebien ebien
column6: dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ Noa no: na EWURADZE toow no mu."

column2: "Na nsuyirii no baa asaase do adaduanan; na nsu no yirii
column4: na ɔmaa do fii asaase do."

column2: "Na nsu no yirii boor do kɛsenara wɔ asaase do; ma hɛn no tsɛɛw nsu no enyi."
"Na nsu no boor do pii wɔ asaase do; na nkokwaa atsentsen nyinara do katae."
"Nsu no boor do kɔr sor basafa esuon na fa; na nkokwaa do katae."
"Na biribiara a nkwa wɔ mu wɔ asaase do nyinara wui
column6: nye nketsebowa a wɔwea asaase do nyinara

column2: "Dza ɔwɔ asaase kɛsɛɛ do nyinara a nkwahom wɔ hɔn mu wuwui."
"Na EWURADZE sɛɛ adze a nkwa wɔ mu a ɔwɔ asaase do no nyinara
column6: nye sor ntumbowa: na ɔkaa Noa
column7: nye hɔn a wɔnye no wɔ hɛn no mu no."

column2: "Na nsu no yirii wɔ asaase do nda ɔha eduonum."
